story_29_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I never would have guessed you’d make it all
the way to the semifinals.
story_29_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
When I first met you, you were a puny amateur
at best.
story_29_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I thought you’d drop out of the running before you
could pick up your first PML badge!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Seriously, Lear?! Are you really gonna do this
right now?
story_29_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s grown a ton since
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] first came to Pasio!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You’ve gotten this far, haven’t you? That’s a fact
I can’t ignore.
story_29_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You’ve proven yourself worthy of standing on
this stage, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_29_04000/2401_0401_1100_10: Hmph. You don’t need to thank me.
story_29_04000/2401_0402_1300_10: Ugh! Don’t get too excited, all right...
story_29_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Besides, you’re not the only one who’s grown a
lot during this tournament!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I’ve grown a thousand times stronger than you
have! No—a million times!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_1600_10:
My team is going to annihilate yours today—
mark my words!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: Not if we crush your team first!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_1900_10: Enough small talk! It’s time to battle.
story_29_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
This is it, young master! Let’s give ’em everything
we’ve got, no holds barred!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
These pip-squeaks don’t stand a chaaance against
us, Master Lear! Let’s do this!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] is tough...
To be honest, I don’t think I’m strong enough
to beat [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] on my own.
story_29_04000/2401_1001_2500_10:
But together...maybe the three of us can. I want
to defeat [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] together—as a team!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Rachel! You and Umbreon are slipperier than
anyone else I know.
story_29_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
We can use that! Distract them with a feint, and
create an opening for me!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Sawyer! You and Honchkrow have served me
longer than any of our other retainers.
story_29_04000/2401_1001_3200_10:
At this point, you know me better than I know
myself! Cover me where you know I need it most!
story_29_04000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Heh! You’ve never been one to stick to the plan,
have you.
story_29_04000/2401_1001_3600_10:
I’ll follow your lead. You just get out there and
have some fun!
